import { useState } from 'react' const General = ({ onAdd }) => { const [firstname, setFirst] = useState('') const [secondname, setSecond] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [role, setRole] = useState('') const [description, setDescription] = useState('') const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() onAdd({ firstname, secondname, email, role, description}) setFirst('') setSecond('') setEmail('') setRole('') setDescription('') } return (
